summary: Vehicle building game with parts placement and free drive mode
architectural_notes: Game includes building mode and drive mode toggle
Drive mode uses WASD keyboard controls
Third-person camera follows vehicle during drive mode
Physics system uses moderate realism with momentum and friction

existing_features.title: Add a 'Drive Mode' toggle button to the assembly game UI that switches between Build Mode and Drive Mode
Implement WASD keyboard controls for driving the assembled vehicle in Drive Mode (W=forward, S=backward, A=turn left, D=turn right)
Implement a third-person camera view that follows behind the assembled vehicle during Drive Mode
Implement moderately realistic vehicle physics with momentum, friction, and turning dynamics that are fun to control
Disable part placement, inventory interaction, and assembly mechanics when Drive Mode is active
Allow driving only when at least a chassis part has been placed in the assembly

new_feature_requests.summary: Add free use/drive mode with WASD controls, third-person camera, and moderately realistic physics
